venue.name: New Britain Museum of American Art

item.description:
The Place- New Britain Museum in Connecticut.

First Friday, Jan. 7, 5:30-8 p.m.
$5 members; $10 non-members

$3 for beer and wine, soda is free

"First Friday features live jazz music performed by local and nationally-known musicians, an opportunity to view the Museum’s premier permanent collection of 300 years of American art, gallery talks, art activities, a chance to mix and mingle with other art and jazz lovers, a selection of light
hors d’oeuvres, and wine, beer, and soda."


WomenArtists@NewBritainMuseum Opening Reception

"January's First Friday features local musician and favorite Theresa Wright and Distinguished Gentlemen performing pop and R&B influenced jazz and a surprise "celebrity" bartender.

The evening will also mark the opening reception of the new exhibition WomenArtists@NewBritainMuseum. Curators Sherry Buckberrough and Nancy Noble will offer remarks at 6 p.m.

The NBMAA also welcomes New Britain institution Angelico's Restaurant to First Fridays. Angelico's will be providing food for January's celebration and a special coupon will be available to all the evening's guests. "

We will meet by the entrance.

..
item.name: Women Artists@NewBritain Museum Opening Reception/ First Friday's
